titleStmt.title: Reports or causes in Chancery collected by Sir George Cary, one of the masters of the Chancery in in [sic] anno 1601, out of the labours of Master William Lambert ; whereunto is annexed the Kings order and decree in Chancery for a rule to be observed by the chancellor in that court, exemplified and enrolled for a perpetuall record there, anno 1616 ; together with an alphabeticall table of all the cases.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Chancery.
Carew, George, Sir, d. 1612.
Lambarde, William, 1536-1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for W. Lee [and 2 others],
